title: Caroline Lucas – 2013 Speech to Green Party Conference
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Caroline Lucas to the Green Party conference on 14th September 2013.
content:
I’m really delighted to have my own chance to welcome you all to Brighton and Hove.
